backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with authorization, storage mixins, and numerous types for products, claims, messaging, delivery, and shop profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Lists evidence linking specific files and components to the feature of publishing the current draft deployment live.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of multiple frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide describing how to publish the draft deployment to a live non-expiring deployment and how to verify functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes plus global background and text styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point setting up root container and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with all application routes wrapped in a layout and theme/toast providers.
Protects admin pages by checking authentication and admin status, showing loading or denial states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProdu: Admin interface to search, sort, edit, and delete products, with dialogs and error handling.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Simple footer displaying branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Responsive header with navigation links based on auth, shopkeeper, and admin status plus notifications and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper that renders header, footer, and page content within a full-height flex container.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Wraps protected content and prompts login when identity is missing or loading.
frontend/src/components/BargainRequestFo: Form for submitting bargain offers with price and optional note, validating input and sending a mutation.
frontend/src/components/BestDealRequestB: Button that sends a zero‑price 'best deal' bargain request if the user is authenticated.
frontend/src/components/claims/ClaimDesc: Text area input for claim descriptions with character count validation and alerts for too short or too long entries.
frontend/src/components/claims/ClaimItem: Lets users select a product or general claim option and shows selected item details using radio cards.
frontend/src/components/claims/ClaimStat: Displays claim progress through submitted, review, and resolution steps with status-specific messages.
frontend/src/components/claims/ClaimStep: Renders a multi-step progress indicator for the claim submission flow with titles and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/claims/ClaimType: Radio-based selector for choosing the type of claim, each with label, description, and icon.
frontend/src/components/claims/ProofUplo: Handles uploading up to five image or video files with validation, error messages, progress tracking, and removal.
frontend/src/components/CompareAcrossSho: Displays and sorts comparable product listings across shops with navigation to each listing.
frontend/src/components/DeliveryOptionsP: Panel for choosing delivery or pickup, calculating simple delivery fee and handling existing orders.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button wired to Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/products/DeleteP: Confirmation dialog for deleting a product with customizable scope and disabled state during deletion.
frontend/src/components/products/EditPro: Dialog for editing a product with form fields, photo uploads, condition handling, and verification labels.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays a product’s photos with carousel controls and thumbnails.
Handles image file selection, validation, previews, and upload progress for product photos.
Shows the first product photo or a placeholder icon if none exist.
frontend/src/components/reports/ReportSe: Dialog for submitting a seller report with reason, details, and basic validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, supporting login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating product, shop, and related data through the actor API. Includes product browsing, retrieval, creation, and shop profile actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes with an earth‑tone palette. Applies global styles and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers. Renders the main App component and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMonitoringPage.t: Displays an admin-only dashboard with tabs for deals, reports, claims, and products. Most sections contain placeholder content except the products tab.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shows the user’s shopping cart with item details, totals, loading/error states, and claim actions. Fetches cart data and product info via query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ClaimsPage.tsx: Shows the user's list of claims, currently empty with a prompt to file a new one. Fetches claims via query hook and handles loading state.
frontend/src/pages/ClaimSubmittedPage.ts: Displays confirmation after submitting a claim with navigation options. Uses AuthGate to require login.
frontend/src/pages/ClaimWizardPage.tsx: Placeholder claim-filing flow showing setup messages and basic navigation. Uses product and cart data but backend logic is not implemented.
frontend/src/pages/DeliveryOrderDetailsP: Placeholder delivery order details page indicating the system is not yet implemented. Includes report dialog integration and back navigation.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesThreadPage.ts: Displays a message thread for a product, loads messages and participant info, and allows sending new messages.
Provides delivery partner registration and availability toggling with form submission and backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product info with cart, wishlist, messaging, comparison, and delivery option actions.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Shows a simple reports dashboard indicating no submitted reports and links back to product browsing.
frontend/src/pages/ShopDiscoveryPage.tsx: Lists products with filtering, sorting, and a promotional hero section for browsing shops and deals.
frontend/src/pages/ShopkeeperInboxPage.t: Displays shopkeeper message threads, loading participant info and linking to each message thread page.
frontend/src/pages/ShopkeeperNotificatio: Displays shopkeeper notifications about likes and cart additions, with loading states and per-notification cards showing user info and timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/ShopkeeperProductsPag: Manages creation, editing, deletion, and display of a shopkeeper’s products, including dialogs, form handling, and bargain acceptance.
frontend/src/pages/ShopkeeperProfileForm: Provides a form for creating a shop profile with validation and submission via createShopProfile mutation.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Shows the user’s wishlist, handles product removal, and displays shop info with loading and error states.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Normalizes backend errors into readable messages and detects authentication-related errors.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Formats bigint prices into INR currency strings.
frontend/src/utils/phoneLinks.ts: Generates WhatsApp and tel links by cleaning phone numbers.
frontend/src/utils/productComparison.ts: Provides utilities for finding matching products and sorting listings by price, rating, or distance.
frontend/src/utils/productCondition.ts: Maps product condition values to display labels and UI badge variants.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash-based), persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and layout settings, and enabling key plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current state, features, and configuration for the app’s publishing workflow.
